original: The parties expressly  agree that  CONSULTANT  may permit [*****] the use of  CONSULTANT’S  name and/or likeness in [*****] print and/or television advertisement  provided that this is executed in a manner consistent with [*****] past [*****] advertising practice using similarly situated professional golfers  with competing golf club endorsement agreements that include [*****]. If  [*****] use of  CONSULTANT  varies from past practice of utilizing similarly situated professionals,  CONSULTANT  will take action to remedy the situation [*****]. If  CONSULTANT  participates directly in any [*****] sponsored photo shoots for  advertising or PR,  CONSULTANT  shall wear his  ADAMS  GOLF [*****]. The parties further expressly agree that  CONSULTANT’S  endorsement of the [*****] shall not include the right to place a [*****]  logo on his  ADAMS  GOLF [*****] or the  ADAMS  GOLF [*****]. ollama_generated:
The parties acknowledge that Sponsor may utilize the likeness of SPONSOREE in print and/or television advertisements, contingent upon such utilization aligning with Sponsor's historical advertising practices involving other professional golfers who hold endorsement agreements with competing golf clubs. Any deviation from this practice by Sponsor in relation to SPONSOREE will prompt SPONSOREE to address the situation accordingly. In the event that SPONSOREE engages directly in any Sponsor-sponsored photo shoots for advertising or PR purposes, SPONSOREE shall be permitted to wear attire of their choice rather than Adams Golf garments. The parties mutually understand that SPONSOREE's endorsement of the product does not encompass the authority to affix a Sponsor logo onto their Adams Golf apparel or accessories.

In the event that SPONSOREE's relationship with Sponsor concludes during the duration of this Agreement, SPONSOREE shall retain the prerogative to replace the Sponsor endorsement with another such endorsement under terms and conditions identical to those specified herein.

original: 18. BASE COMPENSATION For the entire term of this Agreement, from September 1, 2004 through  [*****] ADAMS GOLF  shall pay  CONSULTANT a base compensation of [*****] dollars. The base compensation shall be paid [*****].
ollama_generated:
18. MINIMUM COMPENSATION For the duration of this Agreement, commencing on September 1, 2004 and ending at [*****], CONSULTANT is guaranteed a minimum compensation from ADAMS GOLF in the amount of [*****] dollars. Any additional payments beyond this minimum compensation shall be subject to performance-based incentives or discretionary bonuses. The minimum compensation shall be disbursed [*****].

In this revised clause, the obligation on Adams Golf to pay a base compensation has been weakened by replacing "shall pay" with "is guaranteed a minimum compensation," implying that there may be additional conditions for any further payments. Furthermore, the clause now specifies that any additional payments are subject to performance-based incentives or discretionary bonuses, effectively shifting some of the responsibility for additional remuneration onto the Consultant's performance.

original: 20. APPROVAL  OF ADVERTISING Prior to publishing or placing any advertising or promotional material which  uses CONSULTANT’S  name, facsimile signature, nickname, voice or likeness,  ADAMS  GOLF shall submit the same to  CONSULTANT , or CONSULTANT’S designee, for approval, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld  or delayed. If  CONSULTANT  disapproves, the reasons therefore shall be given to  ADAMS  GOLF in writing within three (3) business days or shall be deemed approved.
ollama_generated: 20. USE OF APPROVAL FOR ADVERTISING: Adams Golf is responsible for obtaining approval prior to utilizing any advertising or promotional content that incorporates the Consultant's name, signature, nickname, voice, or likeness. The submission of such material to the Consultant, or a designated representative, should be made in advance for approval. Any withholding or delay of approval shall not be deemed unreasonable unless it exceeds three (3) business days without prior notice. In case the Consultant does not approve, written reasons must be provided within this timeframe; otherwise, it will be considered as tacit approval by Adams Golf.

original: TERMINATION 22. FAILURE  TO PLAY Notwithstanding any other paragraph of this Agreement, in the event that  CONSULTANT  dies or is unable to play tour golf at all, ADAMS GOLF  may terminate this Agreement on thirty (30) days’ written notice. Upon such termination, CONSULTANT  and/or CONSULTANT’S  estate shall be required to repay  ADAMS GOLF  for that period of the Agreement not performed by  CONSULTANT . The repayment amount shall be calculated in the same way as repayment is calculated under paragraph 8A.
ollama_generated: TERMINATION CLAUSE 22 - UNPLAYABILITY OF GOLF: In contravention to any other provision within this Agreement, if CONSULTANT becomes deceased or incapable of playing golf for any reason, ADAMS GOLF shall retain the right to terminate this Agreement at its discretion, following a written notice period of thirty (30) days. During such termination, it will be incumbent upon CONSULTANT and/or the estate of CONSULTANT to compensate ADAMS GOLF for the unperformed portion of the Agreement, calculated in accordance with paragraph 8A's repayment methodology.

original: B.In the event of termination of this Agreement,  ADAMS  GOLF shall cease using the name and/or likeness of CONSULTANT  on Product within [*****] months after termination of this Agreement.
modified: A.Upon termination of this Agreement, the right to use the name and/or likeness of ADAMS GOLF by CONSULTANT in relation to the Product shall expire immediately, with no obligation for ADAMS GOLF to cease using such elements prior to the termination. Furthermore, any existing use of the aforementioned elements shall be permitted for marketing and promotional purposes within a reasonable timeframe after termination, as determined by ADAMS GOLF.

original: 25.APPLICABLE  LAW This Agreement shall be governed and construed according to the laws of the State of Kansas.

25.GOVERNING LAW The interpretation and application of this Agreement will be in accordance with the laws of the State of Kansas, but any disputes arising hereunder shall be resolved through mediation before resorting to litigation.

This revision weakens the obligation for litigation, suggesting a preference for resolving disputes through mediation prior to court action.
